H0.text: who won the governor election in texas. Greg Abbott

H1.text: who won the governor election in texas. Wendy Davis

H2.text: who won the governor election in texas. Ted Cruz

H3.text: who won the governor election in texas. Rick Perry

A4.text: On November 8, 2022, current governor Greg Abbott was re-elected and became the fifth Texas governor to serve three terms following Shivers, Daniel, Connally and Perry.

A5.text: Former governor Rick Perry, who served from 2000 to 2015, surpassed both these records, becoming the first Texas governor to serve three consecutive four-year terms.

A6.text: In the November general election, Abbott defeated Wendy Davis by over 20 percentage points.

A7.text: In the November 6 general election, Abbott defeated Democratic nominee Lupe Valdez with about 56% of the vote.
